name: eamcet-mock-test-platform
description: EAMCET Mock Test Platform - AI-powered test preparation system

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.type-check: npm run build:shared && npm run type-check --workspaces
scripts.deploy:workers:dev: npm run deploy:dev --workspace=packages/auth-worker && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=packages/test-engine-worker && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=packages/ai-worker && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=packages/analytics-worker
scripts.deploy:workers:prod: npm run deploy:prod --workspace=packages/auth-worker && npm run deploy:prod --workspace=packages/test-engine-worker && npm run deploy:prod --workspace=packages/ai-worker && npm run deploy:prod --workspace=packages/analytics-worker
